title: abishTa varadha
sahitya:
abhISTa varada shrI mahA gaNapatE Agama vEdAntyantarahita

patE 

(abhISTa)



anupallavi



kavIndra ravi vinuta kanakamaya divya carana

kamalamulu nammiti ni 

(abheeSta)



caraNam



mukti mArgamunaku modaTi daivamu nI shakti sumukhata

bhaktulagu vAriki

siddhi buddhi vara phalamu nosagina sadguru shrI

tyAgarAju pogaDina 

(abhISTa)
